buildCommand: export MYSQLCLIENT_CFLAGS=`pkg-config mysqlclient --cflags` && export MYSQLCLIENT_LDFLAGS=`pkg-config mysqlclient --libs` && apt install -y python3-dev default-libmysqlclient-dev build-essential pkg-config && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
